title: Tikal National Park
description: Explore ancient Mayan temples and pyramids in the heart of the jungle at this UNESCO World Heritage Site.

title: Lake Atitlán
description: A breathtaking volcanic lake surrounded by traditional Mayan villages, perfect for boating, hiking, and cultural experiences.

title: Antigua Guatemala
description: A charming colonial city with cobblestone streets, historic ruins, and colorful architecture.

title: Pacaya Volcano
description: Hike an active volcano and witness stunning lava flows and panoramic views.

title: Chichicastenango Market
description: One of the largest and most vibrant outdoor markets in Central America, offering textiles, crafts, and local food.

title: Semuc Champey
description: Natural limestone pools with turquoise waters, hidden deep in the jungle — a paradise for adventurers.

title: Cerro de la Cruz
description: A popular viewpoint overlooking the city of Antigua and the surrounding volcanoes.

title: Ixchel Museum of Indigenous Textiles
description: Dedicated to preserving the traditional dress and textiles of Guatemala’s indigenous communities.
